turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm on my way home and I want to pick up some pizza. Can you put that together for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Where do you want me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Patsy's Pizza. The one on the Upper West Side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have an account there, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do. I have some people coming over for a games night.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'm their website. What should I order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two pizza di Parma, the bigger size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two 17 inch Pizza di Parma. What else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2 of the 17-inch with bacon, peppers and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm looking at the menu, and I don't see bacon. They have prosciutto, sausage, or pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, make those have sausage, then. And I need one for the vegetarians. What so they have that's green?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Arugula or broccoli. They have sundried tomatoes, too. They might like those.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. One with broccoli, mushroom and sundried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One 17-inch with broccoli, sun-dried tomato and mushroom. And sides or appetizers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This is a salad eating crowd. How about a big mixed salad and a big Caesar salad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, that's one family size Insalata Mista and one family size Insalata Romana. It says the dressing comes mixed in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please ask them to put the dressing on the side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll make a note. Anything else you want to add.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I am putting this through. They say you can pick up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Have a great night.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. See you tomorrow.
